answers.answer: I have maintained the same weight for 4 weeks by following a low carb high protein diet.... I was advised to do this because I have too much amniotic fluid and am likely to have diabetes. So far I have gained 5.6kg (sorry don't do lbs!) just make sure your eating enough of the right foods and you should be fine. If you google weight gain second trimester it should have a break down of what you should be gaining each trimester

question: Before i got pregnant i was overweight. About a couple of weeks ago i was 231 now im 229 ao iv been thinking do i have to gain or lose weight during my pregnancy
title: lose or gain?
